mapper.select: SELECT t1.name, t1.province, t1.mobile, t2.mobile mobile2, t2.name name2 FROM zygx_duty t1 LEFT JOIN zygx_person t2 ON t1.name = t2.name AND t1.mobile = t2.mobile AND t1.province = t2.province WHERE t1.date >= #{beginTime} 奥术大师多撒多撒大撒大声地萨达萨达萨达阿萨达达萨达阿萨都是阿萨大萨达 萨达阿萨德啊 AND t1.date < #{endTime}萨达阿萨德撒 AND t1.province = #{province} GROUP BY t1.name, t1.mobile

SELECT t3.`use_name` name, t3.preferred_mobile mobile FROM sync_user t3 WHERE t3.s_province = '00' AND t3.hr_user_code IN ( SELECT DISTINCT PERSON_CODE FROM talents_person_label t2 WHERE t2.LABEL_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT LABEL_CODE FROM talents_label t1 WHERE t1.FULL_TXT LIKE '技术类%' OR t1.FULL_TXT LIKE '专业类%' ) )
